TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: I USE np pack ill try to do it!
thanks dark, pm me the finished product.

Sorry to be pushy but i know your on and your not giving me any sort of answer. I know your orders are backed up and i can help. You have made 3 posts and still have not replied. Im sorry if it was anything I said that is causing you to ignore me.
dang ksp it kept closing ill try to finish it

I did not set an order. I am willing to help with completing orders. I talked to the CEO and he has not replied whether I can help or not. He asked me what i specialize in and I said cargo rockets, Mun landers and simple orbiters. We did that over PM and he still has not replied with a Yes or no. Can you maybe talk to him.
Papa You can join, Sorry its late just been VERY busy.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/19785-0-16-Kermageddon-0-1-Community-Feedback-Alpha Ill set up the server, BUT we can only use certain mods in the server or our ships will get deleted, The mod list is Probodyne, Kethane and Dani-Sangs models, Carts, And MEM by Yogui

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/19785-0-16-Kermageddon-0-1-Community-Feedback-Alpha Ill set up the server, BUT we can only use certain mods in the server or our ships will get deleted, The mod list is Probodyne, Kethane and Dani-Sangs models, Carts, And MEM by Yogui

Can You Add Nova Punch?

Sorry I was pushy. I should have been more patient. How will you contact me giving jobs and things to build?

Edited September 8, 2012 by bigpapabearxx
Just check the board and Claim a order you want.

Where is the board?

Edited September 8, 2012 by bigpapabearxx
Can Someone create a Kermaggedon Server, PM me if you will please. Also The Thread is the Board.
add apllo to the sever thats the only mod i use to get to the mun
I dont use realistic mods, I can send you a 1 manned craft to get to the mun ans give you a tutorial.
How do i know if someone has already accepted something?
i only use mechjeb to get to the mun
XD Mechjeb I forgot to add, I fly by hand but i've been playing since 0.8 and i'm basicly a master at flying spacecraft
Also are there any mods we do not use. How do i deliver the ship to the person that ordered it? Sorry for all the questions.

If your on the server you cant use ANY mods off the list or it will corrupt the server, When your offline you can use any mods.

To deliver the ship just send them the .craft file Via Attatchment on this thread or upload it to Mediafire and send them the link.
Why are we using the "multiplayer" mod? Also just to be clear mechjeb is on the list right?
We are using multiplayer to make it More realistic, It is optional and Yes mechjeb is on the list.
Just send me the link to the multiplayer download and any server info ill need to know. How do i know if a customers request has already been fulfilled?
Hmm, Thats a trick one, You have to look to see if someone has posted a Craft to that request.
Where would they post the craft where I could find it?
I did it i did it i did it i did it i have made a kermageddon sever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Pm me for stuff!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
